662.question: How do they measure which words are under-translated by NMT models?

7-Table1-1.png: They measure which words are under-translated by NMT models by using the F1 accuracy of detecting under-translation errors.</s>
They measure which words are under-translated by NMT models by using the F1 accuracy of detecting under-translation errors.</s>

662.answer:
They measured the under-translated words with low word importance score as calculated by Attribution.
